item.title: 对冲基金艾斯勒裁员 15%，全面改革削减成本
item.description: 艾斯勒资本公司（Eisler Capital）已经解雇了约 15%的员工，因为该公司希望在资产减少和交易亏损的情况下降低成本。【原文：Eisler Capital has dismissed about 15% of its workforce as it looks to reduce costs amid declining assets and trading losses.】

item.title: 特朗普裁减数千名华尔街警察，市场却摇摆不定
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府将缩减 2300 多名美国最高金融监管机构的工作人员，其中包括银行审查员、刑事调查员和经济学家。【原文：Donald Trump’s administration is set to shrink the ranks at the top US financial regulators by more than 2,300 workers, a group that includes bank examiners, criminal investigators and economists.】

item.title: 贝森特致力于为美国在华投资制定明确规则
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他正在与美国立法者合作制定针对中国的对外投资规则，明确哪些是允许的，哪些是不允许的。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he’s working with US legislators on outbound investment rules for China that would make clear what’s allowed and what’s not.】

item.title: 七国集团领导人期待在峰会上就朝鲜加密货币黑客问题举行会谈
item.description: 据熟悉计划的人士透露，七国集团领导人可能会在下个月于加拿大举行的峰会上讨论朝鲜的恶意网络活动和加密货币黑客问题，这反映了全球对平壤日益严重的网络盗窃行为的日益关注。【原文：Group of Seven leaders may discuss North Korea’s malicious cyber activities and crypto hacks at a summit in Canada next month, according to people familiar with the plans, reflecting mounting global concerns over Pyongyang’s growing online thefts.】

item.title: 加拿大银行信守气候承诺，竞争对手加拿大皇家银行放弃目标
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行决定放弃其可持续金融承诺，这引发了人们的猜测，认为加拿大其他主要银行可能会悄悄放弃自己在气候相关贷款、承销和咨询工作方面的目标。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada’s decision to drop its sustainable finance commitment has sparked speculation that other major Canadian players could quietly walk away from their own goals on climate-related lending, underwriting and advisory work.】

item.title: 空荡荡的商店货架可能比你想象的来得更快
item.description:
也许囤积比我们想象的要少？【原文：

Maybe there’s less stockpiling than we thought?

】

item.title: 苹果正努力在浏览器中采用人工智能搜索，与谷歌分庭抗礼
item.description: 苹果公司正在 "积极考虑 "重塑其设备上的 Safari 网页浏览器，以便将重点放在人工智能搜索引擎上，以应对其与谷歌交易的潜在影响以及更广泛的行业变化。【原文：Apple Inc. is “actively looking at” reshaping the Safari web browser on its devices to focus on AI-powered search engines in light of the potential fallout of its deal with Google and broader industry shifts.】

item.title: 马里军政府寻求更多资金，巴里克首席执行官誓言捍卫权利
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.）老板马克-布里斯托（Mark Bristow）表示，他愿意在与马里军政府的争端中让步，但不会放弃公司的权利，以重启这个西非国家一座已关闭的金矿。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. boss Mark Bristow says he has shown a willingness to cede ground in a dispute with Mali’s military junta, but won’t be waiving the company’s rights in order to restart a shuttered gold mine in the West African nation.】

item.title: 南方水务将利用国王街牵头的资金进行债务再融资
item.description: 南方水务有限公司（Southern Water Ltd.）将从国王街资本管理公司（King Street Capital Management）牵头的一批投资者那里获得新的资金，以便为其一些较为安全的债务进行再融资，并稳定其财务状况。【原文：Southern Water Ltd. is set to tap new funds from a group of investors led by King Street Capital Management to refinance some of its safer debt and stabilize its finances.】

item.title: 印度的全球崛起因巴基斯坦的长期冲突而受到拖累
item.description: 自 1947 年英国撤出印度次大陆、印度和巴基斯坦赢得独立以来，印度和巴基斯坦周三第六次相互发动军事打击。【原文：India and Pakistan on Wednesday hit each other with military strikes for the sixth time since 1947, when Britain pulled out of the subcontinent and both nations won independence.】

item.title: 美国动荡后德国银行面临货币紧缩审查
item.description: 在美国国债市场动荡引发全球金融动荡之后，德国金融监管机构将仔细审查该国顶级银行潜在的美元流动性短缺问题。【原文：Germany’s financial regulator will scrutinize potential dollar liquidity shortfalls at the country’s top banks after turmoil in the US Treasury market rattled global finance.】

item.title: 世界对美元失去信心，华泰对冲基金拥抱黄金
item.description: 华泰资本顾问有限公司（Waratah Capital Advisors Ltd.）押注黄金将提高其今年的回报率，因为在全球贸易战期间，投资者将大量资金投入黄金资产，以保护他们的财富。【原文：Waratah Capital Advisors Ltd. is betting on gold to lift its returns this year as investors pile into the asset to shelter their wealth during the global trade war.】

item.title: 德国风力发电量与法国的差距达到全年最大值
item.description: 在德国风力发电不足的情况下，欧洲两大电力市场的电价价差攀升至今年迄今为止的最高点。【原文：The spread between power prices in Europe’s two biggest electricity markets climbed to the highest so far this year amid scant wind generation in Germany.】

item.title: 农作物贸易商安德森公司在关税打击美国出口后暴跌
item.description: 由于关税和美国港口费的不确定性扰乱了贸易，给第一季度业绩带来压力，农作物装卸商安德森公司的股价跌至两年多来的最低水平。【原文：Shares of crop handler Andersons Inc. slumped to the lowest level in more than two years as uncertainty around tariffs and US port fees upended trade, pressuring first-quarter results.】

item.title: 英国石油公司出了什么问题？石油巨头为何重启
item.description: 自英国石油公司（BP Plc）试图重塑 "超越石油 "的品牌形象并采用更环保的形象以来，已经过去了近 25 年。但随着最近从绿色能源转向化石燃料，"回归石油 "也许是更合适的标语。【原文：It’s been almost 25 years since BP Plc attempted to rebrand itself as “Beyond Petroleum” and adopt a more environmentally friendly image. But with a recent swing away from green energy toward its fossil fuel roots, “Back to Petroleum” might be a more appropriate tag line.】

item.title: 阿波罗支持的阿斯彭保险将 IPO 价格定在中间点
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Aspen Insurance Holdings Ltd. 正告知潜在投资者，该公司预计将以每股 30 美元的价格进行首次公开募股，这也是其价格区间的中点。【原文：Aspen Insurance Holdings Ltd. is telling prospective investors it expects to price its initial public offering at $30 per share, the midpoint of its price range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国 Mistral 公司发布专为企业量身定制的人工智能模型
item.description: 法国初创公司 Mistral 正在发布一款专为商业应用案例量身定制的新人工智能模型，试图利用欧洲对过度依赖硅谷技术的担忧。【原文：Mistral is releasing a new artificial intelligence model that’s tailored for business use cases, as the French startup tries to capitalize on Europe’s concerns about being overly reliant on technology from Silicon Valley.】

item.title: 大选在即，波兰自 2023 年以来首次降息
item.description: 波兰央行自 2023 年 10 月以来首次降息，因为这个东欧最大的经济体准备在一周多一点的时间内选出新总统。【原文：Poland’s central bank cut interest rates for the first time since October 2023 as eastern Europe’s biggest economy prepares to elect a new president in a little over a week’s time.】

item.title: 美联储决议前中国贸易谈判有望推动美股上涨
item.description: 美国股市周三开盘跳涨，原因是投资者受到中美两国将于本周末开始贸易谈判消息的鼓舞，同时交易员们也在等待美联储晚些时候的政策决定。【原文：US stocks jumped at the open Wednesday as investors were encouraged by news that the US and China are set to start trade talks this weekend, even as traders awaited the Federal Reserve policy decision later in the day.】

item.title: 据说西班牙电信将考虑改革其技术部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）正在起草重组其技术业务的计划，这是对西班牙最大运营商进行更广泛战略审查的一部分。【原文：Telefonica SA is drafting plans to revamp its technology business, as part of a broader strategic review of Spain’s largest carrier, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥地利打击已停业的 Signa 公司不透明背后的税收漏洞
item.description: 奥地利政府正在寻求弥补财产交易税漏洞，而这一漏洞被认为是导致破产的 Signa 集团公司结构复杂的原因之一。【原文：Austria’s government is looking to close a property transaction tax loophole that was seen as one of the reasons for the complex corporate structure at the bankrupt Signa conglomerate.】

item.title: 举债购买加密货币的效果不如以前了
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 "战略 "筹款手册的成功给模仿者们带来了麻烦，因为他们用来为购买比特币提供资金的可转换债券市场正变得越来越紧张；而一个拥有重量级支持者的竞争对手也即将开始推出自己的债券。【原文：The success of Michael Saylor’s fundraising playbook for Strategy is causing trouble for its imitators, as the market for the convertible bonds they are using to fund Bitcoin buys is getting tighter — and a rival with heavyweight backers is about to start pumping out its own paper.】

item.title: 石油收入连续三个月下降，俄罗斯预算缺口扩大
item.description: 由于石油收入下降和军费开支增加继续给政府财政造成压力，俄罗斯 4 月份联邦预算赤字激增。【原文：Russia’s federal budget deficit surged in April as declining oil revenue and rising military spending continue to strain government finances.】

item.title: 捷克降息，焦点转向停止宽松政策的信号
item.description: 捷克政策制定者在通胀放缓超过预期后下调了利率，由于持续的价格压力和全球贸易风险，投资者现在可能面临长期暂停宽松政策的局面。【原文：Czech policymakers cut interest rates after inflation slowed more than expected, with investors now potentially facing a lengthy pause in easing due to persistent price pressures and global trade risks.】

item.title: 尼日利亚政府计划今年发行两只绿色债券
item.description: 尼日利亚环境部长巴拉拉贝-阿巴斯-拉瓦尔（Balarabe Abbas Lawal）表示，尼日利亚计划在年底前发行两只绿色债券，以资助一项雄心勃勃的经济转型计划。【原文：Nigeria plans to offer two green bonds before the end of the year as it seeks to fund an ambitious economic-transformation plan, Environment Minister Balarabe Abbas Lawal said.】

item.title: 孤星公司将在数周内向投资者返还 35 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在私募股权公司面临现金压力之际，Lone Star Funds 计划在未来几周内向投资者返还 35 亿美元。【原文：Lone Star Funds is planning to return $3.5 billion to its investors in the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter, at a time when private equity firms face pressure to deliver cash.】

item.title: 决策指南：瑞典和挪威可能跟随美联储暂缓加息
item.description: 瑞典和挪威的决策者本周准备暂缓降息，因为他们要面对好坏参半的数据和唐纳德-特朗普贸易战的经济迷雾。【原文：Policymakers in Sweden and Norway are poised to hold off on cutting interest rates this week as they confront mixed data and the economic fog of Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 阿根廷企业违约开始堆积：休克疗法
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）消除了阿根廷经济中一度存在的扭曲现象，那些通过利用汇率差额大量举债的公司受到了伤害，裂缝开始出现。【原文：Cracks are starting to appear as Javier Milei removes the distortions that once characterized the Argentine economy, hurting companies that bulked up on debt by exploiting exchange rate gaps.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 裁员 500 人，网络公司努力提升销售额
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. 正在裁员约 500 人，约占其全球员工总数的 5%，以实现年经常性收入 100 亿美元的目标。【原文：CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. is cutting about 500 jobs, representing about 5% of its global workforce, as it works toward a goal of generating $10 billion in annual recurring revenue.】

item.title: 英国网络安全主管将中国列为黑客攻击的主要威胁国
item.description: 在一系列涉及英国政府部门和关键基础设施的黑客攻击和入侵事件发生后，英国将中国列为国家网络安全的主要威胁。【原文：The UK has named China as the dominant threat to national cybersecurity after a series of hacks and breaches involving British government departments and critical infrastructure.】
